name: Mary's Case
description:
This game was developed for the Fennec game jam #1. The theme of the game was "Looks can be deceiving"

How to play:

The controls are very simple, use the down arrow to continue the dialogue, the left and right arrows to choose when a decision appear,  use enter or space to accept the decision, finally you can use esc to quit the game 

Credits:
